## Builder.panel() method

Adds a panel control

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
panel(label: string, builder: (b: Builder) => void): PanelModel & Removable;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  label | string | The group label |
|  builder | (b: [Builder](./tweak-ui.builder.md)<!-- -->) =&gt; void | A callback allowing to build sub controls |

<b>Returns:</b>

[PanelModel](./tweak-ui.panelmodel.md) &amp; [Removable](./tweak-ui.removable.md)
